label: A4B3_hR7_166_2c_ac-002
title: Bi$_{4}$Te$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
(Villars, 2016) lists Bi$_{4}$Se$_{3}$ as the prototype for this structure, but the data for Bi$_{4}$Te$_{3}$ is much more accessible, so we use that instead. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hR7_166_2c_ac-001}{Al$_{4}$C$_{3}$ ($D7_{1}$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hR7_166_2c_ac-002}{Bi$_{4}$Te$_{3}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A4B3\_hR7\_166\_2c\_ac. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 Hexagonal settings for rhombohedral structures can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
